name: Goldenleaf
description:
Goldenleaf is an interactive first-person experience.

The town of Goldenleaf is in trouble! So...relax, take the day off and meet the residents. You might even be able to help.

The game can be completed in 7 minutes.

If you liked Goldenleaf and it gave you something new, or you just want to help me continue to give you all the strange games I can come up with then please consider donating.

Thanks :D

check out my Dev tumblr for updates about future projects and a post about the inspiration for this one!:

http://ellencunninghamdev.tumblr.com/post/144108337539/magic-in-mundanity-goldenleaf-development-and
